page.prototype: .DecryptConnectionString as A5Storage::CallResult (BYREF DecryptedText as C, ConnectionStringIn as C [, PassphraseIn as C])

argument.name: BYREF DecryptedText
argument.description: The variable into which the decrypted text should be placed.

argument.name: ConnectionStringIn
argument.description: The connection string to be decrypted

argument.name: PassphraseIn
argument.description: The passphrase with which the connection string was encrypted (if any).

return.name: result
return.description: A CallResult object with properties that describe any error returned. Check the Success property to see if the function succeeded.
